Jinx was honestly surprised when she looked up and saw none other than Blackfire. She had heard stories about Starfire having an older sibling who hated her crime-fighting little sis. She never expected to end up meeting her. As the two stared at it each, Jinx got a better look at her features. She was definitely Star's sister that was for sure. Blackfire ripped her arm free from Jinx's grasp and sent a harsh glare at her. Who was this chick and why was she completely naked? Her knowledge on what occurred afterwards was very little but she did know that it was causing trouble for Starfire and her team.

"Yeah. What's it to you?" Her eyes narrowed dangerously towards the tubby villainess and Jinx couldn't help but take a careful step back. "It's just, I heard a lot of stories about you from other villains. You hate Starfire, right?"

Now the black-haired alien was getting slightly interested in this strange conversation. This pink-haired human seemed to know her sister and what she'd done. "Yeah. Do you know her?" Jinx replied by nodding her head and telling how she was an enemy of the Titans. She also went on to explain the whole ordeal of the infection and how she ended up eating anyone who got in her way.

A nasty idea popped into Blackfire's head as she mused over what Jinx had told her. So this gal had a recent enjoyment in consuming other people. What if she got her to go after Starfire and gobble her up?

"You said your name was Jinx? I have a little deal to make with you." A sinister grin spread across Blackfire's lips. "How about you go after my sister and eat her? In return, I'll bring you anyone you'd like." A smile spread across Jinx's chubby face as she listened to the others' deal. How delightful. Go after that tamaranean brat and in return she'd get even more food.

"You've got yourself a deal, Blackfire." The two shook hands and laughed. Poor Starfire had no idea what was coming.

Her mind made up, Raven quickly dressed in her standard leotard and hooded cloak combo before darting out the door. Her heart swelled with a mix of emotions stemming from her desire to admit the truth to Starfire. The half-demoness flew as fast as she could through the tower, looking all over for the Tamaranian. Beast Boy and Cyborg were noisily playing one of their video games in the main room, stopping frequently to throw food at each other or get in an argument or which one was cheating, while Robin was busy in the gym, currently destroying yet another heavy bag by the looks of the several shredded ones laying nearby; each said that they hadn’t seen Starfire today though. Raven’s next stop was Starfire’s room, but again there was no sign of the other young woman. This way and that, Raven crisscrossed the tower, more than a little agitation seeping into her as she continued searching. Eventually, she managed to find Starfire on the roof of the tower, playing some game or something with her pet Silkie.

Now that she had found Starfire though, Raven froze in indecision, as she wasn’t sure how to approach the twin topics of having feelings for the other woman, as well as the whole thing of eating people whole. Starfire tended to be a bit naïve at times, and it was easy for her to misunderstand things. Dare Raven drop both on Starfire at the same time? Starfire noticed Raven floating there finally and greeted her teammate, snapping Raven out of her thoughts. Inhaling deeply, Raven made up her mind.
